item.description:
This will be setup as a recurring dinner meetup occurring the last Friday of every month. Delicious Pasta Nights!  It runs from 6 - 8 and the cost is $7 a person.  A good time is had by all and it's also a great chance to catch up with some old/new friends.

Time: 6 pm
Cost: $7.00
Menu: Salad, pasta with meatballs and sausage / CASH BAR AT MEMBER PRICES

 

The Host for this ongoing meetup is Dick Losh. Please look around the entrance for him or ask for him by name. He will greet you.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Dick Losh around the entrance or ask for him by name

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: Pasta Nights @ Newington Knights of Columbus
